title: BRIEF-Afterpay Touch Group Responds To Recent Media Commentary
text:
BRIEF-Afterpay Touch Group Responds To Recent Media Commentary

Stock Markets 8 minutes ago (Oct 21, 2019 10:14)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Afterpay Touch Group Responds To Recent Media Commentary Oct 21 (Reuters) - Afterpay Touch Group Ltd : * RESPONSE TO RECENT MEDIA COMMENTARY * AFTERPAY IS NOT CURRENTLY SUBJECT TO AN RBA INQUIRY OR REVIEW PROCESS * AWARE OF MEDIA & ANALYST REPORT COMMENTING ON POSSIBLE REGULATORY DEVELOPMENTS FOLLOWING RBA 2020 REVIEW OF PAYMENTS REGULATION * WELCOME OPPORTUNITY TO ENGAGE WITH RBA AS PART OF ITS BROAD BASED, PERIODIC REVIEW OF PAYMENTS INDUSTRY NEXT YEAR * CO GENERATES MAJORITY OF ITS REVENUE FROM MERCHANTS WHO CHOOSE TO PROVIDE AFTERPAY AS A SERVICE, RATHER THAN MERELY A FORM OF PAYMENT

BRIEF-Afterpay Touch Group Responds To Recent Media Commentary
description: BRIEF-Afterpay Touch Group Responds To Recent Media Commentary
